channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-3864] Cannot run any SY application on ER2 due to missing sapjco3.jar
item.description:
For example try to deploy bean-service quickstart. You will end up with:

item.summary: Cannot run any SY application on ER2 due to missing sapjco3.jar

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: A workaround is to remove <module identifier="org.switchyard.component.camel.sap" implClass="org.switchyard.component.camel.sap.deploy.CamelSapComponent" /> from the server config file.
I think ENTESB-3784 will fix this (which effectively does the same thing as your workaround). Tomohisa igarashi can you confirm?
That's correct. Closing as a duplicate of ENTESB-3784
